data.text:
Berrien County unofficial election results

Published 8:43 am Wednesday, August 7, 2024

Getting your Trinity Audio player ready...

SOUTHWEST MICHIGAN — Listed below are the unofficial election results from Berrien County for the Aug. 6 primary election with 100 percent of precincts reported.

Senator (D)

Elissa Slotkin – 6,048

Hill Harper – 2,843

Senator (R)

Mike Rogers – 8,620

Sherry O’Donnell – 6,590
